description:
You have entered the magical world of Isekai, full of charming anime waifu with their own character. You can get to know each one. Hentai RPG: Isekai Journey is an addictive roguelike RPG puzzle game.
Win the favor of beautiful girls by playing three in a row, pumping your skills and abilities. Communication affects the difficulty and obtaining perks.

• 3 charming anime waifu
• Over 10 animated scenes
• Thoughtful system of pumping
name: Hentai RPG: Isekai Journey
